original_solution_mapping.L1: The additional yard he will be able to run to after improving his speed is 40 x 40/100 = <<40*40/100=16>>16 yards.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So the total yard he will be able to run to after improving his speed is 40 + 16 = <<40+16=56>>56 yards in 5 seconds.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Therefore the total yards he will be able to run to within 10 seconds is 56 x 2 = <<56*2=112>>112.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5022.
    Returns: the total yards Georgie will be able to run within 10 seconds.
    """
    # L1
    initial_yards = 40 # 40 yards
    improvement_percentage_numerator = 40 # forty percent
    percentage_denominator = 100 # WK
    additional_yards = initial_yards * improvement_percentage_numerator / percentage_denominator

    # L2
    improved_yards_in_5_seconds = initial_yards + additional_yards

    # L3
    target_time_seconds = 10 # within 10 seconds
    initial_time_seconds = 5 # within 5 seconds
    time_multiplier = target_time_seconds / initial_time_seconds
    total_yards_in_10_seconds = improved_yards_in_5_seconds * time_multiplier

    # FA
    answer = total_yards_in_10_seconds
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The additional yard he will be able to run to after improving his speed is {initial_yards} x {improvement_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator} = <<{initial_yards}*{improvement_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator}={additional_yards}>>{additional_yards} yards.

So the total yard he will be able to run to after improving his speed is {initial_yards} + {additional_yards} = <<{initial_yards}+{additional_yards}={improved_yards_in_5_seconds}>>{improved_yards_in_5_seconds} yards in 5 seconds.

Therefore the total yards he will be able to run to within {target_time_seconds} seconds is {improved_yards_in_5_seconds} x {time_multiplier} = <<{improved_yards_in_5_seconds}*{time_multiplier}={total_yards_in_10_seconds}>>{total_yards_in_10_seconds}.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The additional yard he will be able to run to after improving his speed is 40 x 100/100 = <<40*100/100=40>>40 yards.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So the total yard he will be able to run to after improving his speed is 40 + 40 = <<40+40=80>>80 yards in 5 seconds.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Therefore the total yards he will be able to run to within 10 seconds is 80 x 2 = <<80*2=160>>160.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'percentage_denominator' (100) was used instead of 'improvement_percentage_numerator' (40).
